member.name: P:Accuweather.AccuweatherApi.Locations
member.summary: The Locations API allows users to get a location key for their desired location. This location key will then be used in the other APIs to retrieve weather data.

member.name: P:Accuweather.AccuweatherApi.CurrentConditions
member.summary: Get Current Conditions data for a specific location.
